item.description:
Tax planning is a year-round event. Whether itâ€™s surviving an audit, capitalizing on business deductions, or finding tax-friendly ways to run your business, learn how to make paying taxes less anxiety provoking.

Presented by Robb Morton, Boisselle, Morton & Associates, LLP, Hadley

Date: Thursday, December 9, 2010
Time: 9:00 a.m. - 4:00 p.m.
Location: Scibelli Enterprise Center, 1 Federal Street, Springfield (directions)
Cost: $40
Contact: Western Regional Office at 413-737-6712 or msbdc@msbdc.umass.edu. Register online with link below.
